channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic light head been moved, 9th October
item.description:
At the pedestrian crossing from Meadow Park the traffic light head has been moved around so that the lights are not clear to cars. A car ran the red light this morning when I was trying to cross.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: Broken cycle sign., 9th October
item.description:
Junction of Nine Elms Road and Cheltenham Road as per attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nine Elms Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Cross on small white roundabout ,, 9th October
item.description:
Mini roundabout coming up from pirton road , has a cross painted on it , this is distracting and not allowed, can it be painted over ? 9th october
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 9th October
item.description:
Damaged Sign. Can you please pass on to the relevant AHR to arrange reinstatement
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Obstruction to PROM, a barrier, rope and electric fence, 9th October
item.description:
SO 01961949 - new fence across field - electric with appropriate labelling and handles to remove but two additional obstructions to the right of way. KAN 4

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Templefields, Andoversford, Cotswold

item.title: Missing sign (Parking) problem, 9th October
item.description:
A lot of vehicles that are not residents are parking in the road and make it very difficult for residents to get in and out of the Cul De Sac. This is particularly risky when/if an ambulance needs to use the road to get to a patient or carers/nurses. Can anything be done.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paint on Pavement from resurfacing, 9th October
item.description:
Fairview Rd has recently been resurfaced which is great however the pavements for the entire length of the road are now covered in spray paint markings from the construction. Theses markings should of been cleaned up by the contractors.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairview Court, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
